job.title: Software Engineer (C#, Azure, Chatbot)
job.description:
Title: Software Engineer (C#, Azure, Chatbot)
As the
Sr. Software Engineer
for a nationally recognized healthcare technology company based in Dallas, you will develop and support conversational AI, Voice, and Text applications.
The ideal candidate will have experience with natural language conversation concerning Conversational AI (chatbots, Google/Alexa) and enjoy working in a fast-paced, technically astute team.
Direct Hire position. Local candidates preferred. Unable to sponsor.
Required Skills and Experience
Knowledge in/with conversational AI (chatbots, Google/Alexa voice skills)
Experience with at least two of the following interfaces (text/SMS, “chat bubble” text, IVR-like interaction on a phone or voice device, e.g., Google Hub/Alexa).
C#, .NET Core experience in an Azure environment.
Strong experience with Azure Kubernetes
Demonstrated experience with Agile methodology.
Two + years of experience with relational databases. NoSQL is preferred.
Experience with Angular or React, design patterns, event-driven systems, message-driven systems.
Nice to Have
Knowledge of Node.js and Typescript
Familiar with designs and applications using No-SQL technologies
Experience in microservice development
Prior healthcare experience
Responsibilities
Work with multiple product development teams to support APIs supporting “chat AI” integration across products.
Act as active Agile team member, assisting in the success of the Scrum team
Evolve existing product offerings while also designing enterprise-grade green-field systems.
BENEFITS of working for our Client:
Great Far North Dallas Location
Excellent Medical and 401K with matching
Generous PTO
Work from home options
